name: Grand Grandman's Grand Adventure
description:
GRAND GRANDMAN'S GRAND ADVENTURE IS THE LATEST AND GREATEST GAME BY DURDGE-O.

IN THIS GAME YOU FOLLOW "GRANDMAN" A SUN HUMAN HAS LOST HIS WAY AND IS NOW TRYING TO RECLAIM HIS LOST FORTUNE IN A ODD WORLD THAT HE IS AND ISN'T FAMILIAR WITH.

MEET OLD FRIENDS AND CREATE NEW ONES AS YOUR ADVENTURE TWISTS AND TURNS BEYOND YOUR WILDEST IMAGINATIONS WITH "GRANDMAN'S" PSYCHE SLOWLY DRIFTING AWAY.

CAN YOU MAKE SENSE OF ALL OF THIS? CAN YOU SAVE "GRANDMAN" AND CAN YOU BEAT THE GAME?

YOU CAN FIND ALL OF THESE THINGS OUT BY PLAYING 

"GRAND GRANDMAN'S GRAND ADVENTURE" 

A FREEWARE TITLE AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD AT ALL TIMES.

(Game is Windows only until further notice due to technical issues and such.)
